description:
A nice walk along the Trans-Canada Trail starting near a nice suspension 
 bridge to a lake with some good camping spots. About 15 minutes to  suspension bridge and another 90 minutes walking to lake.
directions: Turn onto Timberlands Road near airport 15 mins south of Nanaimo.  Follow to the end, there is a gravel pit area, drive in, keep right and follow the fence line for about 1.5kms. There is a sign noting the trial to the bridge. Park and walk in.
title: Haslam Creek Suspension Bridge
